Deerfield_Beach.Collier Manor-Cresthaven, Florida: Collier Manor-Cresthaven was a census-designated place (CDP) that now serves as a neighborhood of Pompano Beach, Florida, United States. The population was 7,741 at the 2000 census. During the recent rapid appreciation of home values in South Florida, many homes the Cresthaven neighborhood have come to be better maintained than they once were.
